item.description:
"Sand for the 2011 Revere Beach National Sand Sculpting Festival has arrived on the beach!  This rich sand is brought in from Hudson, New Hampshire, and allows for the creation of tall, sheer, complex sand sculptures."

Join us this Saturday for the 8th annual National Sand Sculpting Festival @ Revere Beach. Let's meet at 2pm by the learning center (it should be next to the bandstand). We will check out the exhibits for a few hours and then grab dinner in the area.

Parking is available in the Wonderland MBTA lot and in the large lot adjacent to Wonderland Greyhound Park on Route 1A. The festival is also easily accessible via the Blue Line from Revere Beach Station.

 
Please see the below link for further details and directions:

http://reverebeachpartnership.com/sandsculpting/
item.how_to_find_us: Meet by the Learning Center @ Revere Beach

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Revere Beach Sand Sculpting Festival
